<thinking>
The task is to list all markdown files (`.md`) within the `cline` directory recursively, in alphabetical order.  The environment details provide a file listing. I can filter this list to only include files within the `cline` directory and ending with `.md`. Then I can sort the resulting list alphabetically.  No tools are needed to perform this task; I can do it directly.
</thinking>
The markdown files in the cline directory, in alphabetical order, are:

04-Add Plugin Pattern to DB Design.md
